image_caption: A silhouetted figure rows a boat on red water towards a large glowing circular portal with silhouettes of various characters inside it, set against an orange sky with tree branches framing the scene.

primary_character.salience_reason: most visually emphasized figure rowing the boat in front of the glowing portal

salient_characters.salience_reason: silhouetted characters visible inside the glowing portal in the background

species_traits: varied humanoid and possibly mythical features
